name: alejandro
description: Una aplicacion para gestion cursos, realizado con angular y laravel

scripts.chmod-backend: docker-compose exec php chmod -R gu+w . && docker-compose exec php chmod -R guo+w .
scripts.chmod-frontend: docker-compose exec npm chmod -R gu+w . && docker-compose exec npm chmod -R guo+w .
scripts.chmods: npm run chmod-backend && npm run chmod-frontend
scripts.install-dependencies: npm run install-front && npm run install-back && npm run back:clea
scripts.install-front: sudo rm -rf ./backend/client/node_modules && docker-compose run --rm npm npm i
scripts.install-back: sudo rm -rf ./backend/server/vendor && docker-compose run --rm composer install
scripts.start:back: npm run install-dependencies-back && cd backend && php artisan serve
scripts.back:clear: docker-compose run --rm composer dump-autoload && docker-compose run --rm artisan config:clear
scripts.re:start: npm run start:migration && npm run back:clear

author: Alejandro Valenzuela
